DOC.brief_summary: This is a clinical study to investigate the safety and efficacy of Synvisc and Depo-Medrol in treating patients with osteoarthritis (OA) of the hip.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Synvisc and Depo-Medrol in Patients With Osteoarthritis of the Hip
DOC.criteria: Patients with symptomatic osteoarthritis pain of hip Patients with current or prior conditions or treatment that would impede measurement of efficacy and safety
